original_title: Pleasure Machines: The History of Pinball
overview: Pinball historian Richard Bueschel hosts an hour-long look at the arcade favorite's illustrious history, including interviews with flipper devotees Slash (from Guns & Roses), Aerosmith guitarist Joe Perry, baseball great Frank Thomas, and others.
tagline: Everybody's Played The Game, But Nobody Knows The Story!
title: Pleasure Machines: The History of Pinball
